name: CHETOS THE HOPLITE
description:
Hi,

My name is Eddy from OEDIPE games, I am installed at Harfleur in Normandy. Currently, I am a 30 years old indie game dev.

For this game I used UNREAL ENGINE 4, BLENDER 2.76, KRITA, MIXAMO and AUDACITY.

VERY IMPORTANT: the beautiful music is

Rise Epic Cinematic Music

from ENDER GULEY here the link (No copyright): 

I struggled at the beginning of the developpement of this game and I did lern a lot

THE 41rst LUDUM DARE had this theme: COMBINE 2 INCOMPATIBLE GENRES

So I decided to create this game which is a SURVIVAL FIGHTING GAME.

The story:

Chetos is an Athenian hoplite and during a war with SPARTA, he received the mission to deliver an important message to the Strategos of Athens.

This mission won't be easy because several soldier of Sparta will stand on his way!!

The game is a 2d side scrolle type with 3D environment.

Due to the lack of time, it is important to assume that You will meet some bugs.

Hope you enjoy my game, do not hesitate to leave feedback as I could go back to improve this game.
